pond.desc: The homey, shallow pond where you were born.  There's a tadpole swimming around here named dawei.

swamp.desc: The water here is murky, but you see a towering giraffe named tallulah.

trail.desc: This well-worn path is marked with many adventures.  You see a pudgy toad named toad.

wetland.desc: The many disconnected pools are separated by reeds and mud.  You see a deer struggling to move named buckley.

empty plot.desc: An unused plot of land.  You triton the turtle basking in the sun.

log.desc: A gigantic tree has fallen here.  It's too big to simply walk over.

grasslands.desc: A wide sea of grass stretching to the horizon.  You see sting, the sneaky scorpion hiding here, as well as snake in the grass.

stream.desc: You feel the current pulling you north.

lake.desc: A massive lake home to many creatures including a large bass. You see a dock at the north end. There is a frog named trevin here

dock.desc: An ancient oak dock. You hear the croaks of other frogs trying to find a mate as well as some pretty lady-frogs, named destiny, karen & violet. But there is a crow awfully close by
